data.title: BERTRAND RUSSELL GETS NOBEL PRIZE
data.meta_description: STOCKHOLM, Saturday. -- Bertrand Russell, British author and philosopher, was yesterday awarded 1950 Nobel Prize for literature by the Swedish Academy of literature. The prize for 1949, not awarded year, was given to American novelist William Faulkner. The official citation for ...
